column4: Hi, my frriend  has a netbook and no usb flash drives but wants Ubuntu..is there any way he could do a network install...?
or any way around installing without a USB?
he wants to get rid of windows and put on edubuntu for his son

There is one way, but it's freaky -- you can mount the physical drive via Virtualbox (preparing an empty partition for Ubuntu beforehand) and install that way, then boot it from real hardware and remove Windows...
